markdownContent: On this page, we're going to discuss two of the *criteria* variables in any pageTransition file, namely *exerciseCriteria* and *affectedExercise*. For *exerciseCriteria*, your string can either be *null* or it can be *correctInput*. If it's *correctInput*, this means that the *buttonText* variable in the pageTransition file will be invisible to the player until they have inputted the correct answer to whatever exercise you, the game-creator, have set them.
